name: MBA and Company
tag_list: talent-brokerage, projects, mba, consultancy, strategy, research, recruitment, network
overview:
MBA & Company was founded by a group of MBA graduates who understood that during the economic downturn companies did not have the funds available to use expensive consultancies or recruitment agencies. It is a means for companies to gain access to talent in a manner that reflects their needs whilst also offering the professional service that they deserve.

MBA & Co aims to democratize the consultancy process and bring top tier business insight to the masses. Our system that minimises wastage, ensure companies pay only for the skills they desire and get access to immediately operational talent.

Our global talent pool covers 5 continents and enables us to provide solutions to companies whatever their location, industry or functional requirements.

MBA & Company maintains an international focus and supports a global base of customers. We have successfully facilitated multiple projects in France, Spain, Germany, Italy, Switzerland, UK, USA, Canada, South Africa, India, Kazakhstan, Belgium, Russia and numerous other countries.
